tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Player (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    player_level INT,
    player_score INT,
    guild_id INT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP,
    creation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    level INT,
    experience INT,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE friendships (
    friendship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player1_id INT,
    player2_id INT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    since DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_player1 FOREIGN KEY (player1_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    CONSTRAINT fk_player2 FOREIGN KEY (player2_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE friends (
    player_id UUID,
    friend_id UUID,
    PRIMARY KEY(player_id, friend_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (friend_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_sessions (
    session_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    player_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Players (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    player_level INT NOT NULL,
    player_score INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Friends (
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    friend_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, friend_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (friend_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Items (
    item_id INT NOT NULL,
    item_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    item_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    item_value INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (item_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Interactions (
    interaction_id INT NOT NULL,
    player_id INT NOT NULL,
    friend_id INT NOT NULL,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (interaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (friend_id) REFERENCES Players(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    player_level INT,
    player_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE friends (
    player_id INT,
    friend_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, friend_id)
)

CREATE TABLE items (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    item_type VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE player_items (
    player_id INT,
    item_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (player_id, item_id)
)

CREATE TABLE messages (
    message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT
)
